column1: GLOBAL SYMBOL STRINGS      ⸽ USE THIS FILE AS TEMPLATE
Message_Restart             ⸽Some of the changes you have made require you to restart the application before they can take effect.
Message_ExportError         ⸽An error occurred during the exportation process.\nMessage: {0}
Error_ROMSize               ⸽The ROM to be injected is larger in filesize than the target ROM. Please choose a different base WAD.
Error_PatchFailed           ⸽Failed to apply the patch. Please disable the built-in patching feature and try again using a manually-patched version.\nUsing unpatched ROM.
Error_FlipsMissing          ⸽Floating IPS was not found within the "apps" folder.\nUsing unpatched ROM.
Error_BannerBrlyt           ⸽Banner.brlyt has not been modified. Make sure you have set up HowardC Tools properly and try again.
Error_InvalidBanner         ⸽The banner you have selected is not a valid Virtual Console banner.
BrowseROM_SNES              ⸽Super Nintendo Entertainment System/Super Famicom ROM files (*.sfc, *.smc)
ImportBanner.Text           ⸽Edit using banner from other base:
label1.Text                 ⸽Welcome to FriishProduce {0}.\n\nPlease select your target platform:
label2.Text                 ⸽Please choose a ROM and a base WAD.
label4.Text                 ⸽Set any additional content options here.
label5.Text                 ⸽You can customize the banner and the image displayed on the Wii Menu and in Data Management, unless you choose to skip this step.
